title: Chains with the largest share of the U.S. burger restaurant market as of June 2014

summary: The statistic shows burger of largest U.S. burger market in 2014 .
In that year , burger of largest U.S. Burger_King McDonald's amounted to 15.4 million burger restaurant .

Sonic_Drive-Ins burger largest were 34.3 million burger restaurant in 2011/2012.Hair Care Products MarketHair care is a dynamic and complex market , driven by the fundamental fact that people are always looking for hair that is more beautiful , healthier and easier to style .
gold: This statistic shows the restaurant chains with the largest share of the burger restaurant market in the United States as of June 2014 . McDonald 's comprised the largest share of the burger restaurant market at 34.3 percent .
